PreceptDef.label: throne speech
PreceptDef.description: Initiate a speech from the throne. {ORGANIZER_labelShort} will go to {ORGANIZER_possessive} throne and call all colonists to listen to a speech there. If all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {ORGANIZER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. The outcome depends on {ORGANIZER_labelShort}'s social abilities.
